content: sts of next side work in patt across second side to last 3 st ending double_crochet 2 decrease over next and last st join and turn round 37 repeat round 35 round 38 chain 3 skip next st work iv and work in patt to last seven st work iv skip next st double_crochet in last st this side rotate and repeat for second side replacing initial ch3 with double_crochet join and turn round 39 bring two sides together along top of stitches right sides together beginning in top of both ivs single_crochet next 8 st decrease through both thicknesses you should have one single_crochet in the ch3 space continuing in side closest to you only work 2 single_crochet in ch3 space and single_crochet across to last ch3 space of this side work 2 single_crochet in ch3 space again bring two sides together along top of stitches right sides together beginning with one single_crochet in ch3 space single_crochet next 8 st decrease through both thicknesses ending single_crochet top of both ivs decrease turn and slip_stitch loosely in these same 8 st back to ch3 space working along second side work 2 single_crochet in ch3 space and single_crochet across to last ch3 space of this side work 2 single_crochet in ch3 space join and turn rounds 40-x repeat rounds 36-39 five times or until bottom portion of sweater fits at high hip or as desired always end with single_crochet row turn to extend length of sweater round x+1 chain 4 skip 1 st double_crochet in next st work in patt to last st this side double_crochet in last st chain 3 double_crochet in first st next side this creates a faux v work in patt to end double_crochet in last st chain 3 and join to 3rd chain of starting chain turn round x+2 work in single_crochet around repeat last two rounds for desired length i added 6 row total always end with single_crochet row very last round this additional round adds some stability to the bottom edge work in single_crochet to st before first valley single_crochet 2 decrease over next and third st single_crochet to next peak single_crochet 2 in center st repeat around end off cuff edge join yarn at cuff and single_crochet evenly around adjusting spacing to fit add row of single_crochet as desired end off and repeat for second cuff finishing weave in ends and block wear with pride
